import React from "react" import { Input, CreateField, } from "../../assetss/common/ValidatorsComponents/ElementsValidators"; import {MaxLengthCreator, required} from "../../utils/validators"; import ts from "./Tasks.module.css"; const TaskEditForm = (props) => { return
Completed? {CreateField("", "lookingForAJob", [], Input, {type: "checkbox"})}
Task title : {CreateField("key", "key", [], Input)}
Start date : {CreateField("key", "key", [], Input)}
deadline : {CreateField("key", "key", [], Input)}
description :
{CreateField("key", "key", [], Input)}
} export default TaskEditForm
